name: The Six Chambers (Minijam 16)
description:
This Westernvania was created in 48 hours for the Compo category of LD43, and polished up in three hours for Minijam 16.

Play as The Stranger as he attempts to get back his stolen car from an outlaw group of androids known as The Six Chambers.

Controls

  • A - Move Right
  • D - Move Left
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Ctrl - Crouch
  • Left Click - Knife
  • Right Click - Gun
